useCase.name: Login Process
useCase.description: User logs in with credentials and selects "Remember Me" option.

mainSequence.step: User enters credentials and selects "Remember Me" option.
Database returns the authentication result to Backend Server.
Backend Server returns the authentication result to Login Page.
Login Page stores the "Remember Me" token.
Backend Server saves the token in the Database.
Database confirms the token is saved.
Backend Server confirms that "Remember Me" is enabled.
Login Page displays the login confirmation to the User.
